title.narrative: Rehabilitation of child soldiers and war-affected children in Yemen (Phase V and VI).

description.narrative: -The project aims to rehabilitate a number of child soldiers and war-affected children, integrate them into society and enroll them in schools. -Psychological rehabilitation of (80) child victims of war and child recruitment -Reintegrate children into their communities as children -Discover the talents of children (line-drawing-theater) and develop them in them -Raise awareness of parents of child soldiers about the dangers of child recruitment and how to create a family environment for them.

1.Providing educational, educational and recreational courses in Marib governorate for children 2. Provide an awareness session for parents of children to prevent violence, injuries and disability in armed conflict
